import sys

t = int(sys.stdin.readline())
def ispalin(x):
    if x<10:
        return True
    strx = str(x)
    for a in range(int(len(strx)/2)):
        if strx[a]!=strx[-a-1]:
            return False
    return True

def isprime(x):
    if x==2:
        return True
    for a in range(2, int(x/2)):
        if x % a ==0:
            return False
    return True

while True:
    if ispalin(t) and isprime(t):
        print t
        break
    t+=1
